projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Responsive weather dashboard with React & TypeScript. Features real-time weather data, 5-day forecasts, geolocation support, and city search. Dockerized deployment with CI/CD pipeline via GitHub Actions.

projects.title: MERN Inventory System w/ DevOps
projects.description: CI/CD: Docker + GitHub Actions. Deployed to AWS EC2 with auto-backups and monitoring. Full-stack application with MongoDB backend and React frontend. Architecture diagram included.
